about-me.first: I hate the pre-established. I do not want to be a 'normal' employee, I do not want to have a 'normal' salary and, of course, I do not want to stay with my arms crossed seeing as my dreams vanish. Now, I am going to mention the things that I want to. I want to work hard to learn and to get going experience quickly to get the best work position that I can imagine, I want to fight per my dreams and, why not, I want to live the life too. As you can see, I am not never satisfied with nothing and, sincerely, I have never endured that there are people who do it.
about-me.second: After this brief speech where I look like a charlatan, a daddy's boy that do not want to land in the real world and everything that you think, I am going to introduce myself.
about-me.third: Hi, I am David Llamas RomÃ¡n and I am a very normal man who wants to do something different which marks a before and after in the actual society. Therefore, I am hard working in my personal brand. Perhaps, everything that I have done so far has not had such an incredible and idyllic result, but Rome was not built in a day. I am sure that that day will arrive.
about-me.fourth: Meanwhile, I am in a constant and permanent learning. To finish this presentation, I will use a serie of words. Hard working, discipline and never surrender.

license.first: All code and files that are in the website project are licensed under GNU General Public License version 3 (GPL-3.0) only. When it mention 'project', it am speaking about the website repository. In this case, it use GitHub to host all files of the website that it have mentioned before.
license.second: When it is speaking about GPL software licenses and appear this word, it means that the software is only under the version where appear the before mentioned word. For example, GPL-3.0-only. In this case, this indicates that the software is only under GPL-3.0 version and it cannot be modified or redistributed under previous or future versions.
license.third: The license can be find in the project GitHub repository, specifically, in a file called LICENSE. In some parts of the project such as the README, it can find a link to the official website of the license. Also, it can find the same link in some parts of this website such as the footer.
license.fourth: It can find a license notice in each one of files of the project, above all, in files that contains code. The license notice says which is the file ownership, which type of software is it and the version of the license under is it.
license.fifth: Also, it says that the software is distributed without any warranty, that is to say, the author do not take responsibility if the software do not work such as you expected. In this part, it is done reference to the MERCHANTABILITY and FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE warranties. In any case, the author do not take responsibility.
license.sixth: Finally, it indicates that you must have received a license copy and, if you did not receive nothing, it appears a link to the official website of the license where you can find the full license. At the end of the license notice, it appears the copyright notice.
